content: Too chilly for a May day. Starts bright, but clouds gather leading to a couple of late afternoon/evening sprinkles.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: A quiet work week weatherwise but a bit chilly for this time of year. Timing not looking good for next rain event as weekend could turn soggy with Mothers Day possibly starting out damp.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Below normal temps for most of the 10 day forecast. Still some question marks about impact of weekend storm. Check in with StormTeam4 at 4,5,6 & 11 for updates and any changes to the Mothers Day forecast.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Today close to a carbon copy of yesterday but changes are brewing. Get the latest forecasts with StormTeam4NY at 4,5,6,&11PM with Janice Huff and Dave Price.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Playball!!! A pleasant afternoon for baseball as Mets go for sweep and try to slay the Giants.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: A stormy soaking rain possible this weekend. Still some changes in forecast possible. Stay with StormTeam4NY and keep updated with www.nbcnewyork.com.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Photos from Chris Cimino NBC's post

content: Below normal temps rest of the week. A stormy weekend, especially Saturday and then finally............finally......some May weather and 70s middle of next week.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Can't seem to do better than the 60s this week. Warmer weather on the way next week. Find out how warm by following the forecast at www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Some big changes over the next 10 Days. Stay on top of any changes anywhere anytime of day by downloading our weather app at www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Its quiet now for one more day but wont be staying that way. A nor'easter heading this way for the weekend. Updated StormTeam4 forecasts with Dave Price and Janice Huff throughout the day and evening. www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Weekend takes a stormy turn. Saturday worse than Sunday as moms may get a break, but a few showers still possible. www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: The wet chilly weather continues into the evening. Some drying on the way overnight. Mothers day still could see a few showers. Updated forecast at 11PM and anytime and www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Almost at halfway point of the month. Much colder and wetter than normal so far. Big swing on both this week, with much warmer temps and little to no rain expected. www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Find that summer wardrobe as we approach 90 degrees by Thursday.  Follow the climb in temperature with Janice Huff & Dave Price at 11AM,4,5,6 & 11PM. www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: The long advertised warm up is finally underway. To track the temperatures today and any time of day download our weather app at www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Photos from Chris Cimino NBC's post

content: Here comes our first summer preview. Turning up the heat and humidity to July levels tomorrow and Thursday. We cool it back down by the weekend. Follow the ups and downs of the forecast with updates from Janice Huff and Dave Price at 11AM, 4,5,6 &11 PM and throughout the day at www.nbcnewyork.com
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Could be a record setter Thursday. Follow the forecast by down loading our weather app at www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: The heat gets turned up further today. Records within reach tomorrow. Updates throughout the day at www.nbcnewyork.com/weather.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Just how hot tomorrow??  Well.... probably enough to shatter some records around the Tri-State area. Keep track of the heat by downloading our weather app at www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: If the heat is too much too soon for you dont worry, much cooler and pleasant weather on the way for the weekend as we head back into the 60s. For updates on the forecast check out News4 at 11AM,4,5,6 & 11PM
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Records expected to be broken today across much of the area. Find out if we get there by checking in with ww.nbcnewyork.com/weather throughout the day.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Big change in temperatures by the weekend. Pretty much stepping back down by a season. Keep track of the forecast and todays heat by downloading our weather app at www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: One more scorcher today as we could hit 90 or better for third day in a row. Much cooler by the weekend. www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: May starts to behave more like itself after today's 90 degree temperatures. Maybe an isolated shower or storm later today and this evening.
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Tomorrow will be the sunnier half of the weekend but it stays cool. Get the umbrellas ready to start the new work and school week. Follow the forecast whenever and wherever at www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Grab the jackets or sweaters tonight as some chill will settle in after sunset. Join me at 11PM for the updated forecast and an early peek into the Memorial Day weekend
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: More seasonable temps ahead on average next week. A few chances for rain with Monday perhaps being the soggiest day. www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Track the rain thru the day with StormTracker4 by downloading our weather app at www.nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: While raindrops appear on many of the days in this 10 Day forecast most will not be washouts but know where your umbrella is at all times. Follow the forecast with Dave Price & Janice Huff at 11AM and then 4,5,6 & 11PM.  www.nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Lots of clouds this evening but rain should hold off until after midnight. Follow the rain with StormTracker4 live radar by downloading the weather app nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Many question marks in this 10Day forecast as we head toward the weekend. Time out the changeable forecast and get the most updated information from Dave Price and Janice Huff at 4,5,6 &11 PM or follow us all day nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: This Wednesday's weather headlines pointing to more wet and unsettled weather returning.  Dont put the umbrellas away too deep into the closets. Follow the rain chances and updated 10day forecast at nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: It may not be the sunniest of weekends but much of the daylight hours will be free of rain. Slight shower chance south along the Jersey Shore tomorrow late afternoon and evening. Best chance for showers and possibly a thunderstorm is Memorial Day, nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Some patience needed this morning as showers slowly exit. Might finally get a bit of sun this afternoon but still cant rule out a quick moving shower. Get your updated forecast throughout the day at nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: A very un-Junelike start to the week. Better days ahead however....stay on top of the forecast with nbcnewyork.com/weather
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos

content: Slow start for June but things will warm up by the weekend. Showers and storms return later today and this evening. Follow the storms with StormTracker4 radar by downloading our app nbcnewyork.com/mobile
name: Chris Cimino NBC
title: Timeline Photos
